ModMetaData.name: Combat System Rebalanced
ModMetaData.author: cjalcortez-ops
ModMetaData.description:
Combat System Rebalanced reworks how armor and damage interact in RimWorld, reducing RNG dominance and creating fairer, more tactical combat.
✦ Features: • Dynamic damage reduction that scales with penetration vs armor difference. • Removes the extreme all-or-nothing armor checks, ensuring even strong armor can be chipped away. • Prevents late-game armored enemies (such as modded mech suits) from becoming invulnerable walls. • Shifts combat towards balance and strategy, where both equipment and tactics matter more than luck.
✦ Compatibility: • Works fully standalone. • Designed to be compatible with most combat-related mods. • Optional load order tags included for flexibility.
Feedback and suggestions are always welcome!
